title: VPN protocol
extract: Internet protocol security, or IPSec, is a protocol used for several purposes, one of them being VPNs. It operates at the the network level as opposed to the application level (used by SSL). IPSec is often paired with other VPN protocols like L2TP to provide encryption, but it can also be used by itself.
extract_html: Internet protocol security, or IPSec, is a protocol used for several purposes, one of them being VPNs. It operates at the the network level as opposed to the application level (used by SSL). IPSec is often paired with other VPN protocols like L2TP to provide encryption, but it can also be used by itself.
